|brand = Emtec |model = EKCOWI |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = 200 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 0bda |device_id = 8187 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = NDD9573160511 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8187L; |chip2 = Realtek;RTL8225; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = EW-7316Ug |manuf_rev = v1 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/09/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.emtec-international.com/de-eu/old_drivers Drivers on '''Emtec''''s site] ([http://www.emtec-international.com/sites/default/files/drivers/wi200.zip Direct Link])
The driver set for the device is for the '''[[Realtek]]''' RTL8187(L/B) chipsets. :This particular dongle is probably an [[Edimax EW-7316Ug v1]].. but some dongle may be [[Edimax EW-7316Ug v2]]s.. :The FCC ID + approval date of the EW-7316Ug v1 has been assigned to this entry.
*[http://www.archlinux.it/forum/viewtopic.php?nomobile=1&p=89725 Post on the '''Arch Linux Forums (IT)'''] :The USB ID appears to be [[0bda]]:8187 - the default RTL8187L ID.. it's presumed to use RTL8187L
[[Category:English Documentation]]
